languages.text: "Зеркало, собранное из осколков, да отразит свет иначе, чем было прежде".
"May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."
languages.original_text: "Зеркало, собранное из осколков, да отразит свет иначе, чем было прежде".

traits.locale_text: "May the mirror assembled out of shards reflect light in a different way than before."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.locale_text: "May the mirror assembled out of shards reflect light in a different way than before."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.locale_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.locale_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.locale_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.locale_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: 「粉々に割れた鏡も直ったなら、また光を完全に反射できるというものだ」
languages.original_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."

traits.locale_text: 「粉々に割れた鏡も直ったなら、また光を完全に反射できるというものだ」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: “愿破镜重圆，反射出全新的光芒。”
languages.original_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."

traits.locale_text: “愿破镜重圆，反射出全新的光芒。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: « Que le miroir brisé et enfin restauré reflète de nouveau la lumière. »
languages.original_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."

traits.locale_text: « Que le miroir brisé et enfin restauré reflète de nouveau la lumière. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: «Que el espejo roto reensamblado refleje una luz completamente nueva».
languages.original_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."

traits.locale_text: «Que el espejo roto reensamblado refleje una luz completamente nueva».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: "Möge der zertrümmerte Spiel wieder zusammengesetzt werden und das Licht neu reflektieren."
languages.original_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."

traits.locale_text: "Möge der zertrümmerte Spiel wieder zusammengesetzt werden und das Licht neu reflektieren."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: "Kırılıp birleştirilen ayna, ışığın her bir zerresini yeniden yansıtsın."
languages.original_text: "May the shattered mirror reassembled reflect light wholly anew."

traits.locale_text: "Kırılan ve yeniden birleştirilen ayna, ışığı yepyeni bir hâlde yansıtsın."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
